name: Paranormal VHS
description:
Story:

James is a vlogger of the channel Paranormal VHS, where he spends a night in some horrifying and abandoned locations where terrible events have happened. His equipment is just a VHS camera that allows him to record any paranormal activity.

His next vlog is to spend a night in the Crimson Hill Hospital that were rumors horrifying experiments were made on their patients and due to some recent mysterious events, the building is now abandoned and considered haunted.

Genre:

Paranormal VHS is a dark psychological horror in the genre of Walking Simulator.

VHS Camera Styled Gameplay:

Immerse yourself in the game from the viewport of a VHS Camera. Special visual effects have been added to enhance the realism and make it one of the most authentic VHS camera experiences in a video game.

Environment:

Get ready to be immersed in a world of fear and realism. Using the power of Unreal Engine 5, the game is created with a hyper-realism in mind which is enhanced by a VHS effect that creates a vintage aesthetic for a more terrifying experience.

Jumpscares:

Get ready for intense jumpscares!



Average time to complete the game: 110min
